String.string: It's good to get to know the people around here.
Learn about campfires and Stamina from Milene.
Set up a campfire and recharge until your Stamina reaches 120%.
Your Stamina has been fully restored!
Learn about campfires and Stamina from Milene.
Use the onslaught charm at the campfire.
You have used an onslaught charm!
Successfully used charm. Talk to Milene for additional information.
